body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#25160](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25160) (ci: Add "macOS 12 native Apple Silicon" task by hebasto)
* [#25110](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25110) (tidy: use modernize-use-raw-string-literal by fanquake)
* [#24952](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24952) (rpc: Add sqlite format option for dumptxoutset by dunxen)
* [#24813](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24813) (build: Getting ready to Qt 6 (4/n). Improve `build-aux/m4/bitcoin_qt.m4` by hebasto)
* [#24798](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24798) ([POC] build: Hello Qt 6 by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
